definition: to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

sentences.english: Now you know the reason why saving box made as piggy bank.
sentences.chinese: 現在你知道爲什麼要用小豬做存錢罐了吧。

sentences.english: My nephew,George,has a money box but it is always empty.
sentences.chinese: 我的外甥喬治有一個存錢罐，可裏面老是空空如也。

sentences.english: This piggy bank is so much fun you won't wait to save.
sentences.chinese: 這蠻好玩的存錢罐會令你迫不及待地存錢。

sentences.english: Only very thrifty children managed to fill up a money boxes.
sentences.chinese: 只有非常節儉的孩子纔會去填滿存錢罐。

sentences.english: Only very thrifty children manage to fill up a money-box.
sentences.chinese: 只有特別節儉的孩子能把存錢罐填滿。
